title: Attero launches e-waste recycling platform 'Selsmart' for consumers
description: Attero has launched Selsmart, an e-waste recycling platform for consumers, entering the D2C sector. Selsmart aims to address India's e-waste crisis, projected to reach 14 million tonnes by 2030. The platform offers scheduled doorstep pickups of old electronics to prevent data leakage and environmental harm. Attero plans to expand its processing capacity significantly in the next five years.
